issue.title: [C++] Remove unused reference to RecordBatchStreamWriter
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11856](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11856). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I came across this when I was search for the C++ equivalent of python's RecordBatchStreamWriter (which is RecordBatchWriter).  Looks like it maybe got left behind from a refactoring or put in wishfully and not needed.
